```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stats)
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

```{r}
fitness<- read.csv("Fitness.csv")
fitness
```
No outliers
```{r}
fitness %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Tread, y=Run))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = lm)
```
```{r}
fitlm<- lm(Run ~ Tread, data = fitness)
fitlm
```

b. 95% confidence interval for slope
```{r}
bothci<- confint(fitlm, level = 0.95)
slopeci<- bothci[2,]
slopeci
```
